alert.note: Alert for Burlington (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 5:42PM EST until further notice by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Jersey... North Branch Rancocas Creek At Pemberton affecting Burlington County. For the Rancocas Creek...including Pemberton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Branch Rancocas Creek at Pemberton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 2.5 feet, Some minor flooding begins in Eastampton along Rustic, Peninsula, and Paducah Roads. Lee Street, Joe Road, and Jill Court in Southampton also begin to flood. At 3.5 feet, Lee Street, Joe Road, and Jill Court in Southampton are subject to evacuations. Old Georges Lane, Rancocas Trail in the Ewansville section of Southampton are also flooded as is Mae Avenue. The flooding in Eastampton spreads to West Railroad Avenue. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 PM EST Monday the stage was 2.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:30 PM EST Monday was 2.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 2.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 2.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 2.7 feet on 12/15/1996. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (7 pm) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Stg Time Date North Branch Ran Pemberton 2.5 2.6 Mon 5 pm 2.8 2.6 2.8 7am 12/19 &&
info.instruction: Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 545 AM EST.
